workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.15649944092193913 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.026970473791590288 --weight-decay 0.0007418594298984747 --lr 0.00020265903129528117 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 40575 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.06619521318960134 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
